verses.verse: הַדָּבָ֛ר <S%H1697><s%> The word אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> came אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3414><s%> which came unto Jeremiah מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD וּנְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֣ר <S%H5019><s%> when Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king בָּבֶ֣ל ׀ <S%H894><s%> of Babylon וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all חֵיל֡וֹ <S%H2428><s%> and all his army וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <S%H4467><s%> and all the kingdoms אֶרֶץ֩ <S%H776><s%> of the earth מֶמְשֶׁ֨לֶת <S%H4475><s%> his dominion יָד֜וֹ <S%H3027><s%> able וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעַמִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> and all the people נִלְחָמִ֧ים <S%H3898><s%> fought עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יְרוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <S%H3389><s%> against Jerusalem וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עָרֶ֖יהָ <S%H5892><s%> and against all the cities לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> thereof saying

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הָלֹךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> Go וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <S%H559><s%> and speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H6667><s%> to Zedekiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> and tell אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> him Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> behold נֹתֵ֜ן <S%H5414><s%> Behold I will give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֤יר <S%H5892><s%> this city הַזֹּאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> into בְּיַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> into the hand מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> of the king בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon וּשְׂרָפָ֖הּ <S%H8313><s%> and he shall burn בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> it with fire

וְאַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> you לֹ֚א <S%H3808><s%> You will not תִמָּלֵט֙ <S%H4422><s%> And thou shalt not escape out מִיָּד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> of his hand כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for תָּפֹ֣שׂ <S%H8610><s%> but shalt surely תִּתָּפֵ֔שׂ <S%H8610><s%> be taken וּבְיָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> into his hand תִּנָּתֵ֑ן <S%H5414><s%> and delivered וְֽ֠עֵינֶיךָ <S%H5869><s%> and thine eyes אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵינֵ֨י <S%H5869><s%> the eyes מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> of the king בָּבֶ֜ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon תִּרְאֶ֗ינָה <S%H7200><s%> shall behold וּפִ֛יהוּ <S%H6310><s%> with thee mouth אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for פִּ֥יךָ <S%H6310><s%> to mouth יְדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> and he shall speak וּבָבֶ֥ל <S%H894><s%> to Babylon תָּבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> and thou shalt go

אַ֚ךְ <S%H389><s%> Yet שְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> Yet hear דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H6667><s%> O Zedekiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עָלֶ֔יךָ <S%H5921><s%> concerning לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> You will not תָמ֖וּת <S%H4191><s%> of thee Thou shalt not die בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> by the sword

בְּשָׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> in peace תָּמ֗וּת <S%H4191><s%> [But] thou shalt die וּֽכְמִשְׂרְפ֣וֹת <S%H4955><s%> and with the burnings אֲ֠בוֹתֶיךָ <S%H1><s%> of thy fathers הַמְּלָכִ֨ים <S%H4428><s%> kings הָרִֽאשֹׁנִ֜ים <S%H7223><s%> the former אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become לְפָנֶ֗יךָ <S%H6440><s%> which were before כֵּ֚ן <S%H3651><s%> so יִשְׂרְפוּ־ <S%H8313><s%> thee so shall they burn לָ֔ךְ וְה֥וֹי <S%H1945><s%> thee [saying] Ah אָד֖וֹן <S%H113><s%> lord יִסְפְּדוּ־ <S%H5594><s%> [odours] for thee and they will lament לָ֑ךְ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for דָבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> the word אֲנִֽי־ <S%H589><s%> I דִבַּ֖רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> for I have pronounced נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

וַיְדַבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> spake יִרְמְיָ֣הוּ <S%H3414><s%> Then Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֔יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H6667><s%> unto Zedekiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <S%H1697><s%> all these words הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem

וְחֵ֣יל <S%H2428><s%> army מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> When the king בָּבֶ֗ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon's נִלְחָמִים֙ <S%H3898><s%> fought עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> against Jerusalem וְעַ֛ל <S%H5921><s%> and against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> and against all the cities יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah הַנּֽוֹתָר֑וֹת <S%H3498><s%> that were left אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to לָכִישׁ֙ <S%H3923><s%> against Lachish וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and עֲזֵקָ֔ה <S%H5825><s%> and against Azekah כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for הֵ֗נָּה <S%H2007><s%> in נִשְׁאֲר֛וּ <S%H7604><s%> remained בְּעָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> cities יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah עָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> of the cities מִבְצָֽר׃ <S%H4013><s%> for these defenced פ

הַדָּבָ֛ר <S%H1697><s%> [This is] the word אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> came אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3414><s%> that came unto Jeremiah מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> God אַחֲרֵ֡י <S%H310><s%> after כְּרֹת֩ <S%H3772><s%> had made הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> that the king צִדְקִיָּ֜הוּ <S%H6667><s%> Zedekiah בְּרִ֗ית <S%H1285><s%> a covenant אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> with all the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בִּירֽוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> which [were] at Jerusalem לִקְרֹ֥א <S%H7121><s%> to proclaim לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like דְּרֽוֹר׃ <S%H1865><s%> liberty

לְ֠שַׁלַּח <S%H7971><s%> go אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> That every man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַבְדּ֞וֹ <S%H5650><s%> should let his manservant וְאִ֧ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and every man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שִׁפְחָת֛וֹ <S%H8198><s%> his maidservant הָעִבְרִ֥י <S%H5680><s%> [being] an Hebrew וְהָעִבְרִיָּ֖ה <S%H5680><s%> or an Hebrewess חָפְשִׁ֑ים <S%H2670><s%> free לְבִלְתִּ֧י <S%H1115><s%> no עֲבָד־ <S%H5647><s%> that none should serve בָּ֛ם בִּיהוּדִ֥י <S%H3064><s%> himself of them [to wit] of a Jew אָחִ֖יהוּ <S%H251><s%> his brother אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> and each

וַיִּשְׁמְעוּ֩ <S%H8085><s%> heard כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַשָּׂרִ֨ים <S%H8269><s%> Now when all the princes וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> which had entered בַבְּרִ֗ית <S%H1285><s%> into the covenant לְ֠שַׁלַּח <S%H7971><s%> go אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> that every one אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַבְדּ֞וֹ <S%H5650><s%> should let his manservant וְאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and every one אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שִׁפְחָתוֹ֙ <S%H8198><s%> his maidservant חָפְשִׁ֔ים <S%H2670><s%> free לְבִלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> no עֲבָד־ <S%H5647><s%> that none should serve בָּ֖ם ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> any וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> themselves of them any more then they obeyed וַיְשַׁלֵּֽחוּ׃ <S%H7971><s%> and let [them] go

וַיָּשׁ֙וּבוּ֙ <S%H7725><s%> they turned אַחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> But afterward כֵ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> after that וַיָּשִׁ֗בוּ <S%H7725><s%> to return אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽעֲבָדִים֙ <S%H5650><s%> and caused the servants וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשְּׁפָח֔וֹת <S%H8198><s%> and the handmaids אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom שִׁלְּח֖וּ <S%H7971><s%> whom they had let go חָפְשִׁ֑ים <S%H2670><s%> free [וַיַּכְבִּישׁוּם כ] (וַֽיִּכְבְּשׁ֔וּם <S%H3533><s%> bring into bondage ק) לַעֲבָדִ֖ים <S%H5650><s%> for servants וְלִשְׁפָחֽוֹת׃ <S%H8198><s%> and for handmaids ס

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Therefore the word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3414><s%> came to Jeremiah מֵאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אָנֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> I כָּרַ֤תִּֽי <S%H3772><s%> I made בְרִית֙ <S%H1285><s%> a covenant אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with אֲב֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> with your fathers בְּי֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day הוֹצִאִ֤י <S%H3318><s%> that I brought them forth אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt מִבֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> out of the house עֲבָדִ֖ים <S%H5650><s%> of bondmen לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

מִקֵּ֣ץ <S%H7093><s%> At the end שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> of seven שָׁנִ֡ים <S%H8141><s%> years תְּֽשַׁלְּח֡וּ <S%H7971><s%> let ye go אִישׁ֩ <S%H376><s%> every man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָחִ֨יו <S%H251><s%> his brother הָעִבְרִ֜י <S%H5680><s%> an Hebrew אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יִמָּכֵ֣ר <S%H4376><s%> which hath been sold לְךָ֗ וַעֲבָֽדְךָ֙ <S%H5647><s%> unto thee and when he hath served שֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8337><s%> thee six שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> years וְשִׁלַּחְתּ֥וֹ <S%H7971><s%> thou shalt let him go חָפְשִׁ֖י <S%H2670><s%> free מֵֽעִמָּ֑ךְ <S%H5973><s%> with וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁמְע֤וּ <S%H8085><s%> hearkened אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1><s%> from thee but your fathers אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or הִטּ֖וּ <S%H5186><s%> not unto me neither inclined אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָזְנָֽם׃ <S%H241><s%> their ear

וַתָּשֻׁ֨בוּ <S%H7725><s%> turned אַתֶּ֜ם <S%H859><s%> Although הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And ye were now וַתַּעֲשׂ֤וּ <S%H6213><s%> and had done אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיָּשָׁר֙ <S%H3477><s%> right בְּעֵינַ֔י <S%H5869><s%> in my sight לִקְרֹ֥א <S%H7121><s%> in proclaiming דְר֖וֹר <S%H1865><s%> liberty אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man לְרֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> to his neighbour וַתִּכְרְת֤וּ <S%H3772><s%> and ye had made בְרִית֙ <S%H1285><s%> a covenant לְפָנַ֔י <S%H6440><s%> before בַּבַּ֕יִת <S%H1004><s%> me in the house אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נִקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> which is called שְׁמִ֖י <S%H8034><s%> by my name עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַתָּשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <S%H7725><s%> But ye turned וַתְּחַלְּל֣וּ <S%H2490><s%> and polluted אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמִ֔י <S%H8034><s%> my name וַתָּשִׁ֗בוּ <S%H7725><s%> to return אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and caused every man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַבְדּוֹ֙ <S%H5650><s%> his servant וְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and every man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שִׁפְחָת֔וֹ <S%H8198><s%> his handmaid אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom שִׁלַּחְתֶּ֥ם <S%H7971><s%> whom ye had set חָפְשִׁ֖ים <S%H2670><s%> at liberty לְנַפְשָׁ֑ם <S%H5315><s%> at their pleasure וַתִּכְבְּשׁ֣וּ <S%H3533><s%> and brought them into subjection אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> לִֽהְי֣וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֔ם לַעֲבָדִ֖ים <S%H5650><s%> to be unto you for servants וְלִשְׁפָחֽוֹת׃ <S%H8198><s%> and for handmaids ס

לָכֵן֮ <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith יְהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> you לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֣ם <S%H8085><s%> Ye have not hearkened אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about לִקְרֹ֣א <S%H7121><s%> unto me in proclaiming דְר֔וֹר <S%H1865><s%> liberty אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one לְאָחִ֖יו <S%H251><s%> to his brother וְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and every man לְרֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> to his neighbour הִנְנִ֣י <S%H2005><s%> behold קֹרֵא֩ <S%H7121><s%> behold I proclaim לָכֶ֨ם דְּר֜וֹר <S%H1865><s%> a liberty נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> for you saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַחֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> to the sword אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַדֶּ֣בֶר <S%H1698><s%> to the pestilence וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to הָרָעָ֔ב <S%H7458><s%> and to the famine וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> and I will make אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> [לִזְוָעָה כ] (לְזַעֲוָ֔ה <S%H2113><s%> be removed ק) לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> to all מַמְלְכ֥וֹת <S%H4467><s%> into all the kingdoms הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

וְנָתַתִּ֣י <S%H5414><s%> And I will give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H376><s%> the men הָעֹֽבְרִים֙ <S%H5674><s%> that have transgressed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִתִ֔י <S%H1285><s%> my covenant אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not הֵקִ֙ימוּ֙ <S%H6965><s%> which have not performed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> the words הַבְּרִ֔ית <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which כָּרְת֖וּ <S%H3772><s%> which they had made לְפָנָ֑י <S%H6440><s%> before הָעֵ֙גֶל֙ <S%H5695><s%> the calf אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who כָּרְת֣וּ <S%H3772><s%> me when they cut לִשְׁנַ֔יִם <S%H8147><s%> in twain וַיַּעַבְר֖וּ <S%H5674><s%> and passed בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between בְּתָרָֽיו׃ <S%H1335><s%> between the parts
